text: Microphorella is a genus of flies in the family Dolichopodidae. It is currently considered both paraphyletic and polyphyletic, and several species groups may need to be recognised as subgenera or genera. ==Species== * Microphorella acroptera Melander, 1927 * Microphorella beckeri (Strobl, 1910) * Microphorella bira Shamshev & Grootaert, 2004 * Microphorella cassari Gatt, 2011 * Microphorella chillcotti Brooks & Cumming, 2012 * Microphorella chiragra Melander, 1927 * Microphorella curtipes Becker, 1910 * Microphorella ebejeri Gatt, 2012 * Microphorella emiliae Shamshev, 2004 * Microphorella iota Colless, 1964 * Microphorella longitarsis Melander, 1927 * Microphorella malaysiana Shamshev & Grootaert, 2004 * Microphorella mamillata Gatt, 2012 * Microphorella ornatipes Melander, 1927 * Microphorella papuana Shamshev & Grootaert, 2004 * Microphorella praecox (Loew, 1864) * Microphorella satunensis Shamshev & Grootaert, 2004 * Microphorella similis Brooks in Brooks & Ulrich, 2012 * Microphorella tubifera Melander, 1927 * Microphorella ulrichi Gatt, 2003 * Microphorella vockerothi Brooks & Cumming, 2012 Microphorella merzi Gatt, 2003 has been moved to Eothalassius. ==References== Category:Dolichopodidae genera Category:Parathalassiinae Category:Taxa named by Theodor Becker
title: Microphorella
